name: project-label
description: Display the current project name and/or VS Code profile in the title bar area.

projectLabel.showProjectName.description: Show the current project/workspace folder name.

projectLabel.showProfile.description: Show the current VS Code profile name.

projectLabel.separator.description: Separator between project name and profile name.

projectLabel.customLabel.description: Override with a custom label. Leave empty to use auto-detected names.

projectLabel.alignment.description: Position of the label in the status bar.

projectLabel.color.description: Label text color (e.g., '#b87333'). Leave empty for theme default.

projectLabel.icon.description: Codicon icon before the label (e.g., '$(bracket-dot)', '$(folder)', '$(account)'). Empty for no icon.

projectLabel.updateWindowTitle.description: Prepend the label to the window title bar (shown near Help button).

projectLabel.showInStatusBar.description: Also show the label in the status bar.

projectLabel.titleTemplate.description: Window title template. Use ${label} for the project label. Supports all VS Code title variables.

projectLabel.useNativeTitleBar.description: Switch to native OS title bar (required on Linux to see the window title). Requires VS Code restart.

projectLabel.silenceCopilotChat.description: Silence all GitHub Copilot Chat sound notifications (request sent, response received, action required, edit modified, edits kept, etc.).

projectLabel.silenceAllSounds.description: Silence ALL VS Code accessibility sound signals (editor, terminal, tasks, diff, notebook, voice, Copilot, etc.).

walkthroughs.title: Get Started with Project Label
walkthroughs.description: Set up your project label, customize appearance, and configure advanced features.

steps.title: Welcome to Project Label
steps.description:
Project Label shows your workspace name and VS Code profile in the status bar and title bar.

[Open Settings Panel](command:projectLabel.openSettings)

steps.title: Configure Display
steps.description:
Choose what to show: project name, profile, or a custom label.

[Toggle Project Name](command:projectLabel.toggleShowProjectName)
[Toggle Profile](command:projectLabel.toggleShowProfile)

steps.title: Customize Appearance
steps.description:
Change the icon, color, and position of your label in the status bar.

[Open Settings Panel](command:projectLabel.openSettings)

steps.title: Title Bar Setup (Linux)
steps.description:
On Linux, enable the native title bar to see the window title text.

[Enable Native Title Bar](command:projectLabel.enableNativeTitleBar)

steps.title: Silence Copilot Chat
steps.description:
Mute all GitHub Copilot Chat accessibility sounds with one click.

[Silence Copilot](command:projectLabel.silenceCopilot)
[Restore Sounds](command:projectLabel.unsilenceCopilot)
